SimbodyBody01_05 Class Reference

#include <SimbodyBody01_05.h>

Inheritance diagram for SimbodyBody01_05:

Detailed Description

A class implementing a Simbody body segment.

Author:
Frank C. Anderson
Version:
1.0

PropertyDbl _massProp [protected]

Mass of the body.

double& _mass [protected]

PropertyDblVec3 _massCenterProp [protected]

Mass center of body.

SimTK::Vec3& _massCenter [protected]

PropertyDblArray _inertiaProp [protected]

Inertia tensor of the body about the center of mass when the local body reference frame is aligned with the global reference frame.

This is a 9-element array in the following order: Ixx, Ixy, Ixz, Iyx, Iyy, Iyz, Izx, Izy, Izz.

Array<double>& _inertia [protected]
